propositions.text: Encounter and companionship form the core narrative of 'Encounter' by Shisan Sheng.
The initial meeting between the narrator and Xiaoyu occurs in a serene, autumnal setting.
Xiaoyu, a child in need, chooses to follow the narrator out of curiosity or fear.
The journey of companionship unfolds through shared hardships and mutual support.
The narrator offers Xiaoyu protection and warmth during a cold, difficult journey.
Challenges such as crossing a dangerous bridge and facing suspicion in a town test their bond.
Hope emerges as a central theme towards the end of the narrative.
A new beginning in a bustling city offers the possibility of stability through work.
Xiaoyu's growing optimism and smiles reflect a transformation through companionship.
